payload.description: Payload can be alarms, messages or any type of user data.

USEMAPPING.description: If true the mapping will be used, otherwise the symbol will be evaluated in the server.

MAPPING.description: This is how the given domain will access the symbol.

SUBSYMBOL_MAPPING.description: This sub-path is not forwarded to the extension. The server automatically browses into the result of the mapped symbol.

HIDDEN.description: Only display this symbol in the advanced view.

allOf.description: Json schema describing the output parameters of the symbol.

DYNAMIC.description: Only dynamic symbols can be removed.

REAUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED.description: Command for writing this symbol requires a login command.
